mapper.select: SELECT c.guid AS categoryId, u.username AS businessOwner, ti.dbname AS database, si.tenant_id, t.name AS tenantName FROM source_info AS si INNER JOIN tableinfo ti ON si.database_id = ti.databaseguid INNER JOIN category c ON si.category_id = c.guid INNER JOIN users u ON si.business_leader = u.userid INNER JOIN tenant t ON t.id = si.tenant_id WHERE si.version = 0 AND si.data_source_id = #{sourceId} AND ti.tableguid = #{tableId}
